title: For people's man Challa Sreenivasulu Setty, the challenge is to take high-flying SBI to newer heights
description: Challa Sreenivasulu Setty's upcoming role as the chairman of State Bank of India follows a period of remarkable growth under Chairman Khara's leadership, marked by a substantial increase in the bank's stock price and improved asset quality.
